statements: SELECT * FROM SurgerySchedule;
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_date, surgery_type FROM SurgerySchedule;
SELECT patient_name, surgeon_name FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE surgeon_id = 1;
SELECT surgery_type, surgery_date, patient_name FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT surgeon_id, COUNT(*) as total_surgeries FROM SurgerySchedule GROUP BY surgeon_id;
SELECT * FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE surgery_date = '2022-08-15' AND surgery_type = 'Appendectomy' ORDER BY surgery_id ASC
SELECT surgeon_name, surgery_type FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE surgeon_id = 101 ORDER BY surgery_date DESC
SELECT surgery_id, patient_id, patient_name FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE surgery_type LIKE '%ectomy%'
SELECT * FROM SurgerySchedule WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY surgery_date ASC, patient_id DESC
SELECT surgeon_id, COUNT(*) AS surgeries_count FROM SurgerySchedule GROUP BY surgeon_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY surgeries_count DESC
SELECT * FROM robot_surgeries
SELECT surgery_id, surgery_type, patient_id, scheduled_datetime FROM robot_surgeries WHERE completed = TRUE
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, consultant_doctor, consultation_date FROM patient_consultations WHERE patient_id = 100
SELECT consultant_doctor, consultation_notes, consultation_date FROM patient_consultations ORDER BY consultation_date DESC
SELECT surgery_type, patient_id, completed FROM robot_surgeries
SELECT * FROM robot_surgeries WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT surgery_type, patient_id, scheduled_datetime FROM robot_surgeries WHERE scheduled_datetime >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(surgery_id) AS total_surgeries FROM robot_surgeries GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_consultations WHERE consultation_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, consultant_doctor, consultation_notes FROM patient_consultations WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM surgeries;
SELECT surgery_name, surgeon_name FROM surgeries WHERE schedule_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT surgery_name, schedule_date FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_contact FROM patients;
SELECT surgery_name, schedule_date, surgeon_name FROM surgeries;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, procedure_name FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_contact FROM patients WHERE patient_dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT surgery_name, schedule_date, surgeon_name FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_contact FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT * FROM surgeons;
SELECT name, specialty FROM surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT surgeon_id, surgery_type FROM schedules WHERE surgeon_id = 3;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM schedules ORDER BY schedule_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT surgeon_id, surgery_type FROM schedules WHERE surgeon_id = 3 ORDER BY surgery_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, s.name AS surgeon_name FROM patients p JOIN surgeons s ON p.patient_id = s.surgeon_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surgeries, surgery_type FROM schedules GROUP BY surgery_type HAVING total_surgeries > 10;
SELECT * FROM Surgeons;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM Surgeons ORDER BY surgeon_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments GROUP BY surgeon_name;
SELECT * FROM Surgeons;
SELECT surgeon_name, specialty FROM Surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT surgeon_name, room_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Surgeons JOIN Appointments ON Surgeons.surgeon_id = Appointments.surgeon_id JOIN OperatingRooms ON Appointments.room_id = OperatingRooms.room_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, consultation_date, consultation_time, consultation_type FROM Patients JOIN Consultations ON Patients.patient_id = Consultations.patient_id WHERE Consultations.consultation_type = 'Follow-up';
